detaileddescription.para: returns the caracter converted from hankaku-kana to zenkakukana. Thanks Yongmao Ni http://alfin.mine.utsunomiya-u.ac.jp/~niy/algo/
returns the character converted from japaneseEUC to SJIS Thanks Yongmao Ni http://alfin.mine.utsunomiya-u.ac.jp/~niy/algo/

briefdescription.para: Implementation of generally used translator methods.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains implementation of the translator methods that are not expected to be reimplemented by derived translator classes. It also contains static data tables used by the methods.
